title: A quip for an vpstart courtier: or, A quaint dispute betvveen veluet breeches and cloth-breeches Wherein is plainely set downe the disorders in all estates and trades.
author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.
publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Wolfe, and are to bee sold at his shop at Poules chayne,
notes: Contains an attack on Gabriel Harvey and his brothers.
Based largely on: The debate betweene pride and lowlines.
Running title reads: A quippe for an vpstart courtier.
